Sustainability Report 20196
About Applied Materials
FY2019 Company Overview Highlights
Applied Materials is the leader in materials engineering solutions used to 
produce virtually every new semiconductor chip and advanced display in 
the world. Our expertise in modifying materials at atomic levels and on an 
industrial scale enables customers to transform possibilities into reality. 
Applied’s innovations make possible the technology shaping the future. AMAT  stock
